title: Loli Hare Chu
description:
Collection of short stories:

1. Hankoki! (Rebellious Phase)
2. Choco Chu～ (Chocolate Kiss~)
3. Play Ball
4. Ane no Ko! (Big Sis' Child, Older Sister's Child!)
5. Imouto HDD Crash (Little Sister HDD Crash)
6. Onani Nani (What's Masturbating)
7. Osewa ni Narimasu (Take Care of Me)
8. Chiisana Kangofu-san (A Small Nurse)
9. Zutto Issho (Together Forever)
10. Shitterushi (I Already Know)
